drupalNodeEvent.title: 13th Annual Conference on China's Economic Development and US-China Economic Relations: The Biden Administration Turns to a Deteriorating US-China Relationship

field_speakers.processed: Speaker David M. Lampton (SAIS Foreign Policy Institute), Discussant Deborah Lehr (Paulson Institute), and moderator Barbara Stallings (GW IIEP).

field_organizers.processed: GW Institute for International Economic Policy, GW Center for International Business Education and Research, and the Sigur Center for Asian Studies

field_description.processed: Our co-sponsored annual conference continues as a virtual series with 2021's keynote address by David M. Lampton, Senior Fellow at SAIS' Foreign Policy Institute. He will comment on the future of US-China relations under a new American administration and will be joined by discussant Deborah Lehr, Vice Chairman of the Paulson Institute, and moderator Barbara Stallings of IIEP.
